help.description: Toggles between true and false states with each incoming message. Extends Logical Switch functionality with state toggling.

payload.description: Any incoming message triggers a toggle

result.name: result

details.text: Each incoming message toggles the internal state between true and false.
Inherits all Logical Switch features: custom true/false values, separated outputs, property targeting, and debounce settings.
Useful for creating flip-flop circuits, alternating patterns, or toggle switches in automation flows.
The initial state is false and changes to true with the first message.
